SRP.Q: In 1961, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Standard Shipping relative to Same-Day Services?
SRP.A: In 1961, Standard Shipping is {above} Same-Day Services in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Same-Day Services, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1971 relative to that in 1957 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Same-Day Services, the data point in 1971 is {above} and to the {right} of the data point in 1957.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Autonomous Vehicles's Delivery Time levels?
VPR.A: Autonomous Vehicles's delivery time levels show a {volatile falling} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Same-Day Services's Delivery Time levels?
VPR.A: Same-Day Services's delivery time levels show a {stable falling} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Standard Shipping's Delivery Time levels?
VPR.A: Standard Shipping's delivery time levels show a {stable rising} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Rural Logistics's Delivery Time levels?
VPR.A: Rural Logistics's delivery time levels show a {exponential falling} trend.

VE.Q: What is Express Couriers's Delivery Time in 1963?
VE.A: Express Couriers's delivery time in 1963 is {3.74} days.

VE.Q: What is Autonomous Vehicles's Delivery Time in 1955?
VE.A: Autonomous Vehicles's delivery time in 1955 is {3.11} days.

VE.Q: What is Same-Day Services's Delivery Time in 1958?
VE.A: Same-Day Services's delivery time in 1958 is {1.70} days.

VE.Q: What are the delivery time of Autonomous Vehicles, Rural Logistics, and Same-Day Services in 1960?
VE.A: Autonomous Vehicles's delivery time is {2.21} days, Rural Logistics's delivery time is {2.23} days, Same-Day Services's delivery time is {1.85} days.

EVJ.A: The global minimum delivery time is {0.03} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Delivery Time level recorded for Autonomous Vehicles?

SC.A: The average value of Standard Shipping's delivery time is {4.55} days.

SC.Q: What is the rate of change in Rural Logistics's Delivery Time from the starting year to the final year?

SC.Q: What is the average value of Express Couriers's Delivery Time?

NF.Q: Which years did Standard Shipping's Delivery Time between 4 and 5 days? Please list the years and corresponding values.
NF.A: {4.03} days in {1962} year, {4.76} days in {1967} year, {4.65} days in {1966} year.

NF.Q: Which years did Express Couriers's Delivery Time below 3 days? Please list the years and corresponding values.
NF.A: {2.39} days in {1975} year, {2.57} days in {1974} year, {2.52} days in {1956} year.

NF.Q: Which years did Rural Logistics's Delivery Time exceed 2 days? Please list the years and corresponding values.
NF.A: {3.63} days in {1955} year, {2.98} days in {1957} year, {3.28} days in {1956} year.

NF.Q: Which years did Rural Logistics's Delivery Time below 1 days? Please list the years and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Between 1955 and 1970, which line experienced the largest change in Delivery Time, Standard Shipping, Rural Logistics, Autonomous Vehicles, or Same-Day Services?
NC.A: {Autonomous Vehicles} experienced the largest change in delivery time.

NC.Q: In 1965, which line had a higher Delivery Time, {Standard Shipping} or {Rural Logistics}?
NC.A: In 1965, {Standard Shipping} had a higher delivery time.

NC.Q: Between 1969 and 1975, which line had the highest average Delivery Time, Standard Shipping, Rural Logistics, or Express Couriers?
NC.A: {Standard Shipping} had the highest average delivery time.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1976, which line experienced the largest change in Delivery Time, Standard Shipping, Express Couriers, or Autonomous Vehicles?
NC.A: {Standard Shipping} experienced the largest change in delivery time.

MSR.Q: Which label shows the largest fluctuation in the line chart?
MSR.A: The label with the largest fluctuation is {Autonomous Vehicles}.

MSR.Q: Which line shows the fastest average growth rate between 1958 and 1975?
MSR.A: {Standard Shipping} has the fastest average growth rate between 1958 and 1975.

MSR.Q: In which year did Express Couriers first surpass Rural Logistics?
MSR.A: Express Couriers first surpassed Rural Logistics in the year {1958}.

MSR.Q: Which label had the leading delivery time since 1970?
MSR.A: Since 1970, {Standard Shipping} had the leading delivery time.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Rural Logistics. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(3 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1955, 1966, 1976}.
